shots.text: A memex is a hypothetical device that would allow a person to store and search through all of their books, records, and communications., and which is mechanized so that it may be consulted with exceeding speed and flexibility. It is an enlarged intimate supplement to his memory.

shots.text: Spaced repetition systems work only as well as the prompts you give them. And especially when new to these systems, you’re likely to give them mostly bad prompts. It often won’t even be clear which prompts are bad and why, much less how to improve them.
